author: Tor Harrington

changelog.release_notes:
- new. sayings and be enabled or disabled. off by default now.
- new. added option to select one of few preset theme colours.
- fix. an issue with crashing buffer overrun with one of the sayings.
- new. added few extra sayings.
- general tweaks.

- fix date display issue where certain values like "18" were being truncated as "1".
- refactor and simply sayings mechanism.
- bounds check random saying to avoid possible crash. safety precaution.
- migrate to SDK 3.13.x.

initial version
- shake to see time
- various random sayings
- default red on white scheme
- supports Pebble Classic, Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel, Pebble Time Round

description:
OnePlus Life - Never Settle

With the build up of #HYPEORGTFO for the OnePlus Three, I thought it would be fun to create something for the launch for myself and fans alike. 

The core of the face is the OnePlus Logo. This is shown by default with the Never Settle slogan. Flick your wrist; Suddenly the time and date will be shown on the screen for approx 5 seconds before switching back. The date is shown within the OnePlus Logo area in the middle of the screen. In the screenshot, it's June 13 and the time is shown below as 23:29 in this case. The time supports both 12 hour and 24 hour formats.

When the the 5 seconds are up, the watch switches back to the OnePlus Logo mode with a twist, it will show some random things based on my own experiences as a fan and being a member of the community. 

Hopefully others find this as much fun and a novelty as I did thinking of it and creating it. There are a few extra things I'd like to put in but I wanted to launch this before the big OnePlus Three launch, because why not, and hey I made a thing...

Oh and, no, you don't need an invite in order to install this watchface!

Thanks ^_*

latest_release.release_notes:
- new. sayings and be enabled or disabled. off by default now.
- new. added option to select one of few preset theme colours.
- fix. an issue with crashing buffer overrun with one of the sayings.
- new. added few extra sayings.
- general tweaks.

title: OnePlus Life
